item.description:
Meet Larry Lunden at Ferry Park, 313 Meadow Rd, on route 160. A short hike to our Methodist Church parcel in the Rocky Hill Meadows. From I-91, take exit 24, route 99, Silas Deane Hwy. Take the Silas Deane south 1.4 miles to a traffic light. Turn left onto route 160, Glastonbury Ave. It is the right most street of the three that you see when you turn left. Proceed past the ferry landing to the gravel parking lot on the right.
Walks will last 2 to 3 hours. Dress for the Weather and ground conditions. Many places will be muddy. Weather and water conditions may revise or cancel. Call the CT Audubon Society for the latest information, 860-633-8402. Free.
item.how_to_find_us: Park in the gravel lot just past the park

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Winter walk, Ferry Park Rocky Hill
